titleStmt.title: Reasons humbly offered for the pasing [sic] a bill for the hindering the home consumption of East-India silks, bengals &c. and an answer to the author of several objections against the said bill, in a book, entitled, an essay on the East-India trade / by T. S. ...; with a postscript containing the French King's decree concerning India manufactures.
titleStmt.author: T. S. (Thomas Smith)
France. Conseil d'Etat.

notesStmt.note: Reproductioon of original in Cambridge University Library.
